org.jetel.component

Class TransformLanguageDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.TransformLanguageDetector

  • public class TransformLanguageDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class helps to detect type of given source code - CTL1, CTL2, JAVA and JAVA_PREPROCESS.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TransformLanguageDetector.TransformLanguage guessLanguage(java.lang.String transformationCode)
      Guesses type of transformation code based on code itself - looks for certain patterns within the code.
